title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; install from PyPI and talk to Ollama in a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you plug any Ollama model into chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with readline history, syntax highlighting, themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Visual Studio Code extension that brings local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API, streaming, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app using Vite and the official ollama-js client; one-command dev setup.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Community plugin exposing Ollama as job workers inside Camunda 8 process automation.

title: ollama-nim-client
summary: Pure Nim client for Ollama with async HTTP, SSE streaming, and nimble package distribution.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial but idiomatic Go SDK for Ollama with context-based cancellation and streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any local Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of model Dockerfiles and Modelfiles maintained by the Ollama team.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and posts replies.

title: ollama-direnv
summary: Direnv extension that automatically downloads and spins up the required Ollama model when you cd into a project.
